tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had a wonderful and meaningful experience with Dr.Shylaja. Highly recommended for genuine treatment. Doctor is a true professional in her approach and have a very calm and intelligent way of handling all the situation to give best output. My end to end journey of pregnancy and delivery was very soothing both medically and mentally which I was very much vouching for. I have been lucky to be treated by Dr. Shylaja. 

Dr.Shylaja is such a great doctor, so humble always available to support. She never minds to respond to my silly queries and doubts. I am thankful to get doctor Shylaja for taking care of me throughout my pregnancy period and delivering our Precious baby boy during. Not only was the consultation and guidance was cordial but doctor was relaxing and guiding me every single moment in operation theatre.Delivery process was smooth and it was very nice experience under her guidance and support.

I would recommend all my friends and other to be mommies to visit Dr. Shylaja. We are thankful to Ma'am for all her support, patience and care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have met many Gynaec's in Bangalore and I truly say that I was satisfied with her services the most. She was very patient and strict whenever required. She took care of me during my pregnancy and delivery and I am glad to say that I was in safe hands.

tags: None
review: Not at all good. She don't explain problem in detail. She will ask unnecessary questions related to Jon n family but not explained problem and treatment properly

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: She don't have some patients to listen my health issues, she was hurry to go . And she suggested me to meet so other junior doctors, but even that junior doctor also was hurry to finish nd go. I was visited for first time .it made me very much disappointed with the behaviour of doctor. So please give some time to the patient's because they come with lots of hope. As it hurts me alot alot , pls don't repeat to other patient's. It hurts us alot .thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She had been very friendly throughout my pregnancy. I had also recommended her to my friend for her delivery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The best doctor I hv visited yet. Very friendly & listens problems with patience.. I recommend this doctor..thank you ☺️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Everything is good. But 500/- for each consultation is too high. ****** ********* ** ***** We are happy when fee is less

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have tried four doctors before going to her. I really was very impressed with her simplicity and calm behavior. 
I was very tensed all the time, *** *** *** **** * ***** ****

Very very happy with her service.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Shylaja is very approachable person. Thorough professional. Patiently explains/answers questions that we ask during pregnancy. I've had a good experience all through my pregnancy, delivery and post pregnancy. Highly recommend to pregnant women. Happy pregnancy:-)
